text:
Happy 15th Birthday Amazon S3! 15 years ago,
the launch of Amazon S3 started a series of

events that would change technology forever!
We’re celebrating one of the first AWS services

that ever launched – 15 years of customer
obsession – and 15 years since the birth of cloud

storage. Through 15 years of continuous
innovation, S3 has offered industry-leading

scalability, data availability, and performance,
allowing you to store and retrieve any amount of

data from anywhere in the world. With its
easy-to-use management features, S3 also lets

you organize your data and configure finely-tuned
access controls to meet your specific business,

organizational, and compliance requirements.
Designed for 11 nines of durability, customers

everywhere trust S3 as their single place to store,
analyze, and gain insights from data - across their

millions of applications and tens of thousands of
data lakes. Thank you for 15 years of trust and

innovation – and here’s to what the next 15 years
have in store. Happy Birthday Amazon S3.
